content.question: Andrene is having difficulties with her roommate. A problem-focused coping strategy for Andrene would be

choices.label: learning to meditate so she can relax when her roommate is annoying her
going directly to her roommate to see if they can work things out
feeling like she is powerless in the situation because she grew up with a sister that was mean to her
waiting until her lease runs out to move in order to save money, even though she wants to move right away

content.answer: going directly to her roommate to see if they can work things out

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
